name: Mixed Signals
overview: Mixed Signals, Inc. provides digital content monitoring solutions. It offers digital services, transport streams, ad insertion, switched digital video, video on demand, and interactive content. The company offers Sentry, a monitoring solution for early detection, diagnosis, and repair of video and audio errors, as well as carousel and bandwidth monitoring, network management, and MPEG and IP transport; SOURCE-TO-EDGE solution that provides the ability to consolidate and standardize various monitoring points from headends and hub sites into a single user interface for configuration, alerting, and reporting; and Medius, an application manager for digital video networks to aggregate, manage, and correlate data from multiple Sentry units deployed in various locations of the network. Mixed Signals, Inc. also provides professional services for items, such as monitoring assessments, issue/problem resolution, OCAP deployment, and bandwidth management; and offers intermediate software updates, electronic and personal support, and program management services. Its monitoring solutions enable cable and satellite television operators, broadcasters, content aggregators, and IPTV providers to simplify deployments of new services and applications. The company offers its products through distributors in Canada, Latin America, the Asia Pacific, the Russian Federation, and Europe/the Middle East/Africa. Mixed Signals, Inc. was founded in 1997 and is based in Los Angeles, California. As of May 17, 2010, Mixed Signals, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Tektronix, Inc.
